room_title: Escape room "Zombie Roadhouse" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: I took 8 of my scout leadership and did Zombie roadhouse. Definitely a frustrating difficult game. Bring your communication game. Cause youâ€™ll need it. Staff is outstanding too!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Roadhouse" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: I was trying to find something for my husband and I to do and ran across Breakout....so glad I did! It was so fun and challenging! We did Zombie Roadhouse and unfortunately didn't make it out. We will definitely be going back again in the near future. I would highly recommend Breakout to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Roadhouse" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: The people in our group were as young as 18 and as old as late 50's and everyone enjoyed the experience equally. All you have to do is work as a team to find clues and solve the puzzles to get the supplies your team needs to survive the Zombie Apocalypse. We had so much fun!!!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Roadhouse" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Fun work outing! We did the zombie apocalypse room and had a blast. Great staff. Easy setup. I'll be getting some people together to try the other rooms

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Roadhouse" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: We had a blast at in the Zombie breakout room tonight! I would recommend this to anyone!!
